title.rendered: OFFROAD ANIMAL PREDATOR BULLBAR – JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE WK2 (2011-2021)

content.rendered:
OFFROAD ANIMAL PREDATOR BULLBAR TO SUIT JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE WK2 (2011-2021)

Offroad Animal Predator bullbar to suit Jeep Grand Cherokee Wk2 (2011-2021) available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Features of the pictured bullbar include;

  • ADR compliant
  • Airbag compatible
  • Works with parking sensors, and Adaptive Cruise Radar
  • Welded one piece bar with welded wing supports
  • Only adds 100mm to the front of the vehicle
  • Zinc plated then powder coated Matte black as standard
  • Hi lift jacking points integrated into design as standard
  • Suits most winches with no extras required
  • Factory fog lights do not fit, however you can run 1 or 2 LED driving lights per wing
  • Number plate flip included as standard for those running a winch
  • Can be colour coded to vehicle
  • Offroad Animal steel tow hooks are required to run this bumper
  • 2 different under panel set ups, for those running Air Suspension and those not. Make sure you select which suspension you have in options above. No air suspension means smaller panels that sit closer to body

This bar suits the following WK2 Grand Cherokees Model Year 2014-2021 including Overland, Limited, Trail hawk and Laredo.

We still need to confirm fitment on S- Limited, S Overland and Summit. It will fit but bumper cut not yet worked out.

The Predator bullbar DOES suit 2011-2013 models however you will have a larger gap between bar and grill/factory bumper than other models.

PLEASE NOTE: Price of bullbar includes freight to Automax 4×4 in Coffs Harbour. Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your Jeep Grand Cherokee!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
